title: Mr. and Mrs. David Mandarich Surgery Oncology Research Fund
description: To support research and other academic activities in the area of thoracic surgical oncology currently under the direction of Dr. Michael Weyant in the Division of Cardiothoracic Surgery at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To support research and other academic activities in the area of thoracic surgical oncology under the direction of Dr. Michael Weyant in the Division of Cardiothoracic Surgery at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
